item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

I am currently a Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK), supervised by Prof. Michael R. Lyu and Prof. Irwin King. Before that, I got the B.Eng. degree in the Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University. My research interests include computer vision, deep learning and machine learning. Our 3D face reconstruction paper is accepted by ACCV 2020 as oral presentation. Our Flow2Stereo is accepted by CVPR 2020.
